website_summaries.verdict: If you know a child who loves LEGO and dinosaurs, they’ll love rampaging though a plastic jungle as a T-Rex, dilophosaurus, triceratops, or their own special dinosaur.
pros: Mix and match your own dinosaur creations
Available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PS4
cons: The story mode could be longer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Very good game it your child likes lego and Dinosaurs. Our 8 year old enjoyed the game a lot. Only downfall might be that it's to short and he seemed to complete the game quickly. I would highly recommend Lego World and the sandbox mode if your child likes lego's and building.
customer_reviews.author: mjk55344

customer_reviews.title: Good game bad glitch
customer_reviews.text: Why do all these lego games have a glitch in them where you can't continue the game
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Love it, only give 4 stars because it not have instructions on how to play or interact between characters. Found some tips in the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, so much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun! Who knew Lego could make such fun games!!! If you love the movies then you will love even more, if you don't, you still will have so much fun. There's so much to do!! So much to accomplish and collect. It was a great fun!!! I beat it in 6 days!!!
customer_reviews.author: VReview

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, minor issue
customer_reviews.text: Great game I enjoyed it on ps4 now I can play it anywhere. The only issue with the switch port is that it has random shutters that are not frequent. If this would ruin a game for you play it on pc or ps4, but its such a minor issue that I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Americankraut

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this game
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old and I loved this game! It's really fun and it's very similar how it is in the movie. A lot of things to do. I just wish there is a free downloadable contents like the lego movie 2 game.
customer_reviews.author: Berkenz

customer_reviews.title: Quality game!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this game! It is beautifully done and even has original voice clips from the movies! Very well detailed and beautifully animated! I even enjoy playing with them! Very surprised and happy! Totally recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Kid Friendly and Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Jurassic Park/World and I deeply appreciate how LEGO made the story line KID FRIENDLY! Bravo to that! They keep to the exact story line as the movies but like I said, no extreme violence nor blood. My son needed a little guidance on the controls and puzzles, so you might need to help out and teach them how to problem solve a bit. Comes in different languages and subtitles too! Awesome and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: openmindedtrees

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when we started playing the game and discovered it contained elements from all the Jurrasic movies. I also love that you got to play as people and dinosaurs. Having tons of fun with this game.
customer_reviews.author: J King

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game
customer_reviews.text: I loved this LEGO game! It’s super fun and even though I didn’t love when they added voices to the characters for these games this one was better because it sounded like the actual actors at least. I found the map a little confusing but overall the game was really a good time and the story was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: FerretParty

customer_reviews.title: Great game for family fun
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVES that you can not only be the characters from the movie, but earn and play as dinosaurs. This was a great value, and we've had a ton of fun playing it. I like the LEGO games because there's no blood and guts, when you fall off of a cliff or a dinosaur gets you, you become a pile of legos... haha
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: great game but one small issue.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game but I really think the Lego people will be angry when they see what the Jurassic Park people took from them.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your Dino lovers!!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this game! He is 6 and has caught on pretty well on how to play! When he needs help he asks us to how him how then does it himself! Love that he is spending time playing such an interactive game with his two favorite things! Dinosaurs and Legos!
customer_reviews.author: Vivien

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite LEGO game!
customer_reviews.text: The LEGO games have always held a special place in my heart (mainly the LEGO Star Wars and Indiana Jones) so when I first played LEGO Jurassic World on my Xbox I knew I had to get it on my Switch and it’s been absolutely fantastic. I would absolutely recommend this to all ages! And if you’re a Jurassic Park fan and you haven’t played it yet, then you’re REALLY missing out.
customer_reviews.author: Elarrek

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my son
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old boy loves this game. some parts are hard but he loves the 2 player option and I help him figure out where to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto gomez

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons love this game 6 and seven year olds
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my seven year old grandson for one of his birthday gifts and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO game. My son loves dinosaurs. He’s 4 years old and loves this game. It is he’s favorite. Easy to play and the controls are easy too. Has plenty of things to do in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with LEGO games!! They’re the cutest and I love playing them with my son!
customer_reviews.author: Rozilla 🦖

customer_reviews.title: I love dinosaurs 🦖
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always like LEGOs and dinosaurs. So when Jurassic Park came out in 1993 I was really hoping for this game in 1993 on the Sega. But they decided to wait until after Jurassic World to make a game. I’m really glad because the graphics are so much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Like all the LEGO games, a ton of fun without much thought. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Herman Douchefinder

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play keeps my daughter busy for hours
customer_reviews.author: Adam Henning

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great game, my 7 years old son is having so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alejandra Vega

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loved it so much. Brand new still wrapped. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: I am a big jurassic fan and just love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Poche

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old plays it every single day. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Very disappointed in my purchase
customer_reviews.text: No instructions for playing the game. There is no objective. My children are not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Erica in Miramar

customer_reviews.title: Solid family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great game overall. The have had a couple of glitches that I had to restart. Enjoy having free play so my kids get more out of the game.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old's favorite game!
customer_reviews.text: My son (6 years old) loves this game! Every day he wants to play. I like that it has puzzles and challenges in the game that get him thinking critically.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good price good game
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and he loves this game ! One sad thing is we finish this game with 3days.. lol wish there is something more. Worth money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game, my son thought he beat it but it has different levels! Great wholesome game
customer_reviews.author: nichole heiss

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old and he had a hard time trying to figure it out so his 7 year old sister decided to help and they seem to be getting it now! Great game!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Great game for all Jurassic World lovers
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this game. Graphics are amazing and storyline is awesome. So much fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this game!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and LOVES this game. We don’t let him play very often, but when we do this is the first game he plays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feeling scammed
customer_reviews.text: The case came but no game... how does this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Game for 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son absolutely adores this game! Ordering from amazon makes it way easier than searching all over town!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this game so much to do and compete. It was fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: We love playing this game. My kids 6,7, and 9 all enjoy playing. I also find it fun!
customer_reviews.author: Meghann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Alwsome game
customer_reviews.text: If u never played a lego game this is a must, great game lots of challanges and optics fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Wagner jr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game and you get like four games for the price of one so it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Works. Came wrapped and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: My son was soooo excited to get this for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. They won't stop playing it since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: The best game
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best LEGO games. Super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this video game for my little son and it is excellent. Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: ysabel gomez

product_meta.title: Lego Jurassic World - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Following the epic storylines of Jurassic park, the Lost world: Jurassic park, Jurassic park III, and Jurassic world, LEGO Jurassic world allows players to relive and experience all four Jurassic films. Reimagined in LEGO form and now available on Nintendo Switch, The thrilling adventure allows fans to play through key moments and explore isle nobler and isle saran.
feature_bullets: Wreak havoc as LEGO dinosaurs: choose from 20 dinosaurs, including the friendly triceratops, deadly Raptor, and even the mighty to Rex
Customize your own dinosaur collection: collect LEGO amber and experiment with DNA to create completely original dinosaurs
Explore isle nobler and isle saran: put your unique dinosaur creations in to paddocks as you complete free play missions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,254 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
